title: Will Ekko's Skin be on sale?
body:
So i saved 1900 Rp  and I've been wondering  this for the longest. Will i be able to purchase ekko and his skin? 
If it's not enough i'll just purchase more.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

The bundle for the champion and the skin is 1462 RP. The skin is 975 RP and will not be discounted.
It's enough, he's in the store now. 14xx RP.
Most champ launches include the champ and skin in a bundle for a discounted rate, you should be fine.
